item.title: RuneScape Merching FC | Make money with us today!
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:2, topic:539902”]I am not trying to hate, but the problem I found with merching clans is the higher ups pre-buy and then pre-sell. Causing all the lower guys to not make as much money, or make no money.[/quote]That’s why you need to make your own clan and monopolize items you can bulk-buy (which aren’t retarded). The upper echelons of any trade-circle will always make the most money, as you go down the hierarchy, the income gets less and less. It’s simple economics at best.

Read full topic
item.source: RuneScape Merching FC | Make money with us today!
